data.meanings: Proposition which points to cause, space or time. In, into, amongst, in company with, during, with, of, for, for the sake of, upon, concerning, after, in comparison, about, among, on account of, respecting, by the side of, on, by, against, according to, in respect of.
data.sentence: The word فِي comes from the root ف ي and is associated with the meanings: Proposition which points to cause, space or time. In, into, amongst, in company with, during, with, of, for, for the sake of, upon, concerning, after, in comparison, about, among, on account of, respecting, by the side of, on, by, against, according to, in respect of.

The word أَوْ comes from the root ا و and is associated with the meanings: or

data.meanings: to say/speak, to call, to be named, word/speech, utterance, a thing said, greeting, discourse, one who says/speaks. To inspire/transmit/relate/answer/think/profess, emit an opinion on, indicate a state or condition or circumstance. qa'ilun - speaker, indicator.
data.sentence: The word وَقَالُوا comes from the root ق و ل and is associated with the meanings: to say/speak, to call, to be named, word/speech, utterance, a thing said, greeting, discourse, one who says/speaks. To inspire/transmit/relate/answer/think/profess, emit an opinion on, indicate a state or condition or circumstance. qa'ilun - speaker, indicator.

data.meanings: (law) - optative particle, if/though/although, conditional.Often at the start of verses/sentences.
data.sentence: The word لَوْ comes from the root ل و and is associated with the meanings: (law) - optative particle, if/though/although, conditional.Often at the start of verses/sentences.

data.meanings: to company, associate, be the friend of or companion to. saahibun (pl. sahbuun and ashaabun) - companion, associate, possessor of any quality or thing, one in an intimate relation with anything, fellow and showing any type of connection or link, helper. saahibatun - spouse, consort, wife. saahaba - to bear company. ashaba (vb. 4) -to preserve, hinder, keep from, defend from. yushabuun - they will be accompanied.
data.sentence: The word أَصْحَابِ comes from the root ص ح ب and is associated with the meanings: to company, associate, be the friend of or companion to. saahibun (pl. sahbuun and ashaabun) - companion, associate, possessor of any quality or thing, one in an intimate relation with anything, fellow and showing any type of connection or link, helper. saahibatun - spouse, consort, wife. saahaba - to bear company. ashaba (vb. 4) -to preserve, hinder, keep from, defend from. yushabuun - they will be accompanied.

data.meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.
data.sentence: The word كُنَّا comes from the root ك و ن and is associated with the meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.

data.meanings: to light/kindle a fire, made it burn, provoke mischief, to be blasted, fire/blaze/heat/hell/flame, madness/insanity/possessed/demonic, vehement hunger/thirst.
data.sentence: The word السَّعِيرِ comes from the root س ع ر and is associated with the meanings: to light/kindle a fire, made it burn, provoke mischief, to be blasted, fire/blaze/heat/hell/flame, madness/insanity/possessed/demonic, vehement hunger/thirst.
The word نَسْمَعُ comes from the root س م ع and is associated with the meanings: to hear, hearken, listen.

data.meanings: to bind, keep back, be intelligent, become wise, understand, pay the blood price for anyone, ascend on the summit of a mountain, use understanding, abstain.
data.sentence: The word نَعْقِلُ comes from the root ع ق ل and is associated with the meanings: to bind, keep back, be intelligent, become wise, understand, pay the blood price for anyone, ascend on the summit of a mountain, use understanding, abstain.
